column10: Japan, early Edo Period
column12: 日本，江户时代早期

column10: Finally, after centuries of civil war, there is hope for peace as a new Shogun rises to unify the nation.
column12: 历经数百年战乱之后，终于又出现了一位可以独掌大权的幕府将军，日本即将迎来久违的和平。

column10: In the stronghold of Osaka Castle the last  adversary remains defiant. After months of siege, the Shogun sends a lone Shinobi into the heart of the enemy fortress …
column12: 将军的最后一位对手仍然在大阪城内负隅顽抗。眼看数月围城无果，将军便秘派一位独行忍者潜入到敌方要塞中心……

column10: In the stronghold of Osaka Castle the last  adversary remains defiant. After months of siege, the Shogun sends a lone Shinobi on a secret mission …
column12: 将军的最后一位对手仍然在大阪城内负隅顽抗。眼看数月围城无果，将军便秘派一位独行忍者执行一项隐秘任务……

column9: after killing the guard and hiding the corpse
column10: Nothing personal. Just can't have you warn the others up there.
column12: 虽与你无冤无仇，但我不能让你走漏了风声。

column10: Looks like a whole nest of guards. Bet they're preparing for the Shogun's next attack.
column12: 真是戒备森严。看来正在为抵挡将军的下次进攻做准备。

column10: Looks like a whole nest of guards. Who'd have thought! This might actually get challenging.
column12: 真是戒备森严，万万没想到!看来这次有点棘手。

column10: Not much happening here. I'll keep my head down, just in case.
column12: 这边好像没什么情况。但还是小心为妙，以防万一。

column10: Barricades everywhere. Who'd have thought! This might actually get challenging.
column12: 到处都是路障。万万没想到!看来这次有点棘手。

column10: Barricades everywhere. Bet they're preparing for the Shogun's next attack.
column12: 到处都是路障。看来正在为抵挡将军的下次进攻做准备。

column10: There. Have to reach that gate. Guess I have my work cut out for me.
column12: 大门在那儿，必须先到那里。这下有得忙了。

column10: First order is to reach that gate. Should be a good warm up for the real mission.
column12: 首先要到达那扇大门处。任务开始前正好就当热身了。

column10: Hayato has just swum through the castle moat. No he is just a short climb away from entering the castle.
column12: Hayato has just swum through the castle moat. No he is just a short climb away from entering the castle.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Climb won't be a problem. Better hurry though. The Shogun will start his attack soon.
column12: 攀爬不过是小菜一碟。不过得抓紧时间，将军很快就要进攻了。

column10: Hayato overhears two guards while sneaking past.
column12: Hayato overhears two guards while sneaking past.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Six months of this. How much longer will this go on?
column12: 这仗都打了六个月了，什么时候才能打完？

column10: It doesn't matter. No Shogunate scum will ever set foot in this castle.
column12: 没关系。反正那些幕府军废物，没一个能踏入此城半步。

column10: Hayato has climbed inside the castle.
column12: Hayato has climbed inside the castle.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Better stay out of sight.
column12: 最好别让人看到。

column10: Many guards block Hayato's path. An officer appears and calls everyone to the wall so they can repel the Shogun's next attack.
column12: Many guards block Hayato's path. An officer appears and calls everyone to the wall so they can repel the Shogun's next attack.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Everyone gather!
column12: 全员集合！

column10: The Shogunate army will attack soon! We will face them with honour.
column12: 幕府军很快就会发动进攻！让他们尝尝我们的厉害。

column10: A guard calls for reinforcements.
column12: A guard calls for reinforcements.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Damn. Have to hide, now!
column12: 不好，赶紧藏起来!

column10: Hayato finds a backyard with many dead civilians.
column12: Hayato finds a backyard with many dead civilians.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Huh … they starved to death ... bad way to go.
column12: 嗯……他们都是饿死的……真惨。

column10: Hayato encounters a lonely guard (continued).
column12: Hayato encounters a lonely guard (continued).

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: I could sneak past this one … or take him out quietly.
column12: 是该默默溜过去呢…… 还是悄悄杀了他呢。

column10: Hayato has snuck past the lonely guard and left him alive.
column12: Hayato has snuck past the lonely guard and left him alive.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column9: if Hayato has let the lonely guard live
column10: Don't mind me. Just passing through.
column12: 不用管我，我只是路过。

column10: Hayato kills the lonely guard.
column12: Hayato kills the lonely guard.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column9: if Hayato kills the lonely guard
column10: Better safe than sorry.
column12: 抱歉，安全起见。

column10: Hayato finds the easy way to his objective blocked.
column12: Hayato finds the easy way to his objective blocked.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hrm … gate's blocked, wall's too high. Guess I'll have to take a detour.
column12: 呵……大门锁着，墙又太高。没办法只能绕道了。

column10: Hayato has to distract a couple of guards.
column12: Hayato has to distract a couple of guards.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: They're too close together to take them out. Better use a distraction.
column12: 这俩站那么近没法一次干掉，只能分散他们注意力了。

column10: Hayato runs into a dead end. Then the Shogunate army starts attacking. On the nearby castle wall, samurai Mugen rushes in with a handful of Shogunate men. Only Mugen survives and is now cornered.
column12: Hayato runs into a dead end. Then the Shogunate army starts attacking. On the nearby castle wall, samurai Mugen rushes in with a handful of Shogunate men. Only Mugen survives and is now cornered.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: This one's shut too. I'm running out of options here.
column12: 这扇门也锁了。那就没办法了。

column9: cannonfire is heard, nearby houses are hit by cannonballs
column10: Damn! The offensive has started. I have to get inside somehow …
column12: 不好！进攻已经开始了。无论如何我都得进去… …

column10: Forward men! For the Shogun!
column12: 冲啊！为了将军！

column10: Argh … damn you!
column12: 啊! ……糟了！

column10: Y-you have nowhere to run! Show yourself!
column12: 你已无路可逃！快出来！

column10: Teh, samurai! Always get themselves killed ... Hate to admit it, but he's my best chance. Better help him.
column12: 这帮武士！从来都是这么不要命…… 虽然不想，但现在也只能靠他了，让我先帮他一把。

column10: Hayato plans to take out a guard with his shuriken.
column12: Hayato plans to take out a guard with his shuriken.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: They're far enough apart. If I use the Shuriken, no one will hear until it's too late.
column12: 他们站得很散，可以用手里剑，神不知鬼不觉地干掉他们。

column10: Hayato causes a disturbance that distracts the guards. Mugen rushes in and finishes them off all at once.
column12: Hayato causes a disturbance that distracts the guards. Mugen rushes in and finishes them off all at once.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: For the Shogun!
column12: 为了将军！

column10: After killing the guards, Mugen vows to help Hayato.
column12: After killing the guards, Mugen vows to help Hayato.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: I noticed your involvement just now. Tell me your name so I can thank you properly.
column12: 我知道有人暗中相助。请问尊姓大名，在下要好好答谢。

column9: tries to talk around the fact that he needs help
column10: Mind if you let me inside first? I like being thanked in person.
column12: 那就让我先进去吧？你可以当面谢我。

column10: Ha, very well. I will repay my debt at once by opening the gate for you.
column12: 哈哈，好啊。这就为你开门，就当还礼了。

column10: Mugen realizes he cannot rush in blindly or he will be overpowered.
column12: Mugen realizes he cannot rush in blindly or he will be overpowered.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: My men are dead. I will join them soon if I do not proceed carefully.
column12: 手下都已阵亡。我必须谨慎行事，否则也命不久矣。

column10: Mugen plans to draw an unsuspecting guard towards himself by placing a bottle of sake as bait.
column12: Mugen plans to draw an unsuspecting guard towards himself by placing a bottle of sake as bait.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: I should lure them towards me. Perhaps my sake will be adequate bait.
column12: 最好能把敌人引过来。或许我的清酒可以当做诱饵。

column10: Mugen sneaks up on 3 soldiers that stand close together.
column12: Mugen sneaks up on 3 soldiers that stand close together.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Three opponents close together. I shall use Kazekiri to defeat them all at once.
column12: 那三个人站得很近，我可以用剑风把他们瞬间斩杀。

column10: Three opponents close together. I shall use my Kazekiri technique to defeat them all at once.
column12: 那三个人站得很近，我可以用剑风把他们瞬间斩杀。

column10: Three opponents close together. I shall use my Sword Wind technique to defeat them all at once.
column12: 那三个人站得很近，我可以用剑风把他们瞬间斩杀。

column10: Mugen spots a cannon that he can use to blow open the gate that's blocking Hayato.
column12: Mugen spots a cannon that he can use to blow open the gate that's blocking Hayato.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Aha, the cannon! It points directly at the gate.
column12: 啊，火炮!而且正好瞄着大门。

column10: That cannon, perhaps I can make use of it.
column12: 有架火炮，正好为我所用。

column10: Mugen uses the cannon to open the way for Hayato. The two introduce themselves and discuss the plan to .
column12: Mugen uses the cannon to open the way for Hayato. The two introduce themselves and discuss the plan to .

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: My thanks again for your assistance. I am Ōshiro Mugen! And you are …
column12: 不胜感谢。在下名叫尾城无限，你是……？

column10: Hayato, from the Iga region.
column12: 伊贺的，隼人。

column9: as high ranking samurai, Hayato must answer him
column10: Iga … I see. There were rumours that our Shogun had hired a Shinobi. Tell me, what is your mission?
column12: 伊贺……原来如此。早就听说将军大人雇了一位忍者。告诉我，你的任务是什么？

column10: I have to open the Yagura Mon.
column12: 我必须打开櫓门。

column10: The main gate? Preposterous! It is heavily fortified!
column12: 打开主门？别说笑了!那边可是铜墙铁壁!

column9: hasn't figured out yet how to move the barrel
column10: Not from the inside. One barrel of gunpowder will do the trick. Just have to get it in position.
column12: 所以要从内部击破。只需一桶火药即可，问题是怎么把它运到合适的位置。

column10: Not from the inside. Won't be easy, but I'll figure something out.
column12: 所以要从内部击破。虽然也不容易，但我会想办法的。

column10: After the briefing
column12: After the briefing

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: A daunting task. Very well. I shall accompany you.
column12: 看来任务艰巨。那么，我来助你一臂之力吧。

column10: That's … kind of you, but I work alone.
column12: …...好意我心领了，但我一向独来独往。

column10: I will not hear of it! Together we will succeed where we both failed alone.
column12: 这我就不同意了，单独行动势单力薄只会失败，共同合作事半功倍必定成功。

column10: I didn't, but as you wish. We have to be quiet, or we won't get far.
column12: 好吧，你说了算。但一定要隐秘行动，不然肯定完不成任务。

column10: Alright, Hayato of Iga. We shall do this your way.
column12: 明白了，伊贺的隼人阁下。就按你的计划来行动。

column10: The team could enter the main castle through a gate, but Hayato doesn't like that because it's heavily guarded.
column12: The team could enter the main castle through a gate, but Hayato doesn't like that because it's heavily guarded.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: There's the gate. Should we enter?
column12: 那有扇门，从那进去如何？

column10: Hrm … the gate's guarded on the other side. I'd rather go around, find a spot where I can climb the walls.
column12: 唔……门内有守卫。还是绕道吧，找个能爬墙的地方翻过去。

column10: I won't be able to climb the walls.
column12: 我爬不了墙......

column10: Too much armour, eh? Don't worry. Once I'm inside, I'll clear the way for you.
column12: 盔甲穿太多了吧？别担心，等我进去帮你开路。

column10: The team enters another section of the castle. Guards are everywhere. Hayato and Mugen must hide dead guards so that the others are not alarmed.
column12: The team enters another section of the castle. Guards are everywhere. Hayato and Mugen must hide dead guards so that the others are not alarmed.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: This area is tightly guarded.
column12: 这里真是戒备森严。

column10: Don't leave bodies out in the open. Hide them in bushes, barrels, empty houses.
column12: 尸体不要留在显眼的地方。可以搬进灌木、桶或者空房子里。

column10: Who would have thought that one day I'd take lessons from a Shinobi.
column12: 没想到今天让忍者给我上了一课。

column10: Two officers discuss strategy at a table with a map.
column12: Two officers discuss strategy at a table with a map.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Do we have enough men here?
column12: 这里的人手够不够？

column10: The south wall needs securing.
column12: 南墙那边需要警戒。

column10: How are the granaries doing?
column12: 粮仓情况如何？

column10: We need to fortify this area.
column12: 这片区域需要加强防御。

column10: We must send men here.
column12: 这里必须再派些人手过来。

column10: The Shogun's looking for a weak spot.
column12: 将军肯定在找我们的薄弱环节。

column10: Send someone to clear the debris.
column12: 找人把这些瓦砾清理了。

column10: We must send supplies there.
column12: 必须给那边送些补给。

column10: Someone shouts warnings when the Shogun attacks with canons or archers!
column12: Someone shouts warnings when the Shogun attacks with canons or archers!

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Cannon fire!
column12: 小心火炮！

column10: They're loading the cannons!
column12: 他们在给火炮装弹!

column10: Cannons are firing!
column12: 火炮开火了！

column10: Archers!
column12: 小心弓箭!

column10: They're lighting their arrows!
column12: 他们用上火箭了!

column10: Arrows incoming!
column12: 弓箭来袭!

column10: Find cover!
column12: 快找掩护！

column10: Get under cover!
column12: 快躲到掩体下面!

column10: Stay down!
column12: 蹲下!

column10: The team encounters static enemies. These enemies wear straw hats, a sign that they are strictly disciplined and won't leave their posts.
column12: The team encounters static enemies. These enemies wear straw hats, a sign that they are strictly disciplined and won't leave their posts.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: See those guards with straw hats?
column12: 看到那些戴草帽的守卫没？

column10: Those men over there, the ones wearing straw hats …
column12: 看那边的守卫，都戴着草帽……

column9: detests those that follow duty blindly
column10: Your little sake trick won't work on the straw hat guards. They never leave their posts.
column12: 你的清酒吸引不了这些草帽，他们从不擅离岗位。

column10: I understand.
column12: 明白了。

column10: The team has almost made it to the main castle gate. Hayato and Mugen work well together. A bond starts forming between them.
column12: The team has almost made it to the main castle gate. Hayato and Mugen work well together. A bond starts forming between them.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Can't be far now.
column12: 应该不远了。

column10: Your skill is impressive, Hayato-san. A shame that your clan is no more.
column12: 隼人兄，你真是身手了得。可惜你们伊贺已不复存在了。

column10: We can agree on that ... have to say, you're doing better than I thought.
column12: 确实非常痛惜……说实话，你也很不错，比我预想得要厉害。

column10: Ah, your way of things is still strange to me, but I am starting to see its merits.
column12: 啊，虽然还是觉得你们的行为很奇怪，但我现在也开始切身体会到你们忍者的长处了。

column10: The team witnesses a guard being shot from an impossible angle. They figure it must be Takuma, who has taken position on top of an enemy tower.
column12: The team witnesses a guard being shot from an impossible angle. They figure it must be Takuma, who has taken position on top of an enemy tower.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column9: camera shows Takuma on the tower
column10: Swallow in the dusk … spare my little buzzing friends … among the flowers
column12: 筑巢有群燕，来去翻飞口衔泥，何故落杯池？

column10: Shot came from the tower … someone's up there.
column12: 是从塔楼上开枪的……有人在上面。

column10: That must be Takuma-san, a master marksman from the third division.
column12: 肯定是琢磨大师，他是隶属第三部队的神枪手。

column10: Hehehe, two allies approach. You want to destroy the Yagura Mon, yes? Then heed my advice.
column12: 呵呵呵，来了两位盟友。你们想破坏櫓门，对吧？那就听老夫一言。

column10: A wise man needs only one barrel of gunpowder to open the Yagura Mon.
column12: 聪明人只需一桶火药即可炸开櫓门。

column10: Place one close to the gate, and I will detonate it for you.
column12: 把火药桶放到门附近，我就可以引爆。

column10: However, there is no direct path. Try to get there on the ground and you will fail.
column12: 可是，没有直达门前的路可走。非要从地上走的话必败无疑。

column10: Ladders lead to the top of the Yagura Mon. If you have the strength, lift the barrel up there, then throw it down to its ultimate destination.
column12: 用梯子可以登上櫓门顶部。只要力气够大，可以把火药桶搬上去，之后将其抛至门前。

column10: After spotting Takuma, Hayato explains their plan to Mugen.
column12: After spotting Takuma, Hayato explains their plan to Mugen.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hmm, my rifle can clear the path ahead. Let me recite another Haiku.
column12: 呵呵呵……我的狙击枪可为你们开路。让我再吟俳句一首。

column10: Takuma can't leave his sniper spot, even if the player wants him to.
column12: Takuma can't leave his sniper spot, even if the player wants him to.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hehe, how could I leave now? I am precisely where I'm needed.
column12: 呵呵呵，怎么能现在离开呢？这个位置再好不过了。

column10: Takuma shoots a guard with his long range rifle. Mugen tells Hayato about Takuma.
column12: Takuma shoots a guard with his long range rifle. Mugen tells Hayato about Takuma.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Impressive shot. Not bad for an old man.
column12: 果然厉害。老人还能打这么准。

column10: Do not be deceived. I saw him train our soldiers. None of them could match his skill.
column12: 人不可貌相。我曾见过他训练士兵，他的枪法无人能及。

column10: Glad he's on our side then.
column12: 辛亏他是我们这边的。

column10: Takuma shoots a second guard with his long range rifle
column12: Takuma shoots a second guard with his long range rifle

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column8: more impressed than he wants to admit
column10: He doesn't miss, does he?
column12: 还真是弹无虚发。

column10: They say he once defended a mountain pass all by himself. Rumour has it that ten shots were heard, yet fifteen bodies were found.
column12: 有传言说他曾凭一己之力镇守住了整条山道。据说只听到十声枪响，却发现了十五具尸体。

column10: And I'm the Shogun's personal tea servant.
column12: 哈哈！那我还可以说我是将军的贴身茶童呢。

column10: Teh … nobody's that good.
column12: 啊？不可能这么神吧。

column10: That's why I don't listen to rumours.
column12: 所以我从不听信传言。

column10: Takuma shoots a third guard with his long range rifle
column12: Takuma shoots a third guard with his long range rifle

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: For love and for hate … I swat a fly and offer it … to an ant.
column12: 爱憎两相宜，拍蝇果蚁腹

column10: Hayato and Mugen reach the place where gunpowder barrels are stored.
column12: Hayato and Mugen reach the place where gunpowder barrels are stored.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Ah, the two have reached the barrels. Now, who will play the part of the mule?
column12: 啊，二人已到火药桶处。那么谁来当苦力呢？

column10: Hayato-san, I will carry the barrel. I trust in your protection.
column12: 隼人兄，火药桶我来搬。有你保护我很放心。

column10: Don't worry, I have your back.
column12: 别担心，有我在。

column10: Hayato climbs the tower where Takuma is perched.
column12: Hayato climbs the tower where Takuma is perched.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hehe, have you come to ask for advice, boy?
column12: 呵呵呵，年轻人，你是来向我讨教吗?

column10: You're … an old man! How did you get up here so quickly?
column12: 你……都这么老了!到底是怎么爬上这里来的?

column10: Hmm, a fair question since you have taken the longest possible route.
column12: 嗯，你是绕了最长的那条道上来的，难怪会问这种问题。

column10: Not going to tell me are you?
column12: 看来你不打算告诉我咯？

column10: Hehehe …
column12: 呵呵呵……

column10: Mugen has carried the barrel halfway to the gate.
column12: Mugen has carried the barrel halfway to the gate.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Halfway there.
column12: 走了一半了。

column10: Hmm, such strength. It will be easy for him to heave the barrel up onto the Yagura Mon.
column12: 嗯，力气真大。对他来说把桶扔到城门顶上简直易如反掌。

column10: A group of enemy soldiers is covering the front gate of the castle. They are prepared to face Shogunat troops if they break through.
column12: A group of enemy soldiers is covering the front gate of the castle. They are prepared to face Shogunat troops if they break through.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Hold the gate, men!
column12: 大家顶住大门!

column10: Let no one through!
column12: 一个都不能放进来!

column10: We will hold the gate!
column12: 一定要守住大门!

column10: They will not get past us!
column12: 没人能过我们这关！

column10: Mugen throws the barrel down from the gate. It lands directly in front of enemy soldiers.
column12: Mugen throws the barrel down from the gate. It lands directly in front of enemy soldiers.

column10: What the … ?!
Mugen places the barrel so when it blows up it will open the way inside for the Shogunate army.
column12: Mugen places the barrel so when it blows up it will open the way inside for the Shogunate army.

column9: has just thrown down the barrel
column10: There!
column12: 接招！

column10: Now it's up to the old man.
column12: 该老头出马了。

column10: Hehe, that was a delight to watch! Now, let me fulfil my end of the bargain.
column12: 呵呵，你们表现得不错！现在轮到我了。

column10: Takuma blows up the barrel in the wrong spot.
column12: Takuma blows up the barrel in the wrong spot.

column9: blames his miss on bad luck
column10: Hmm … unfortunate.
column12: 嗯……真是可惜。

column10: Watch it, old man! Not like we have many of those!
column12: 小心点，老头! 总共也没几个桶可以用！

column10: Hehe, do not worry, boy! It will all work out in the end.
column12: 呵呵，别担心，年轻人! 车到山前必有路。

column10: The team explodes the main castle gate and the Shogunate army rushes inside. Mugen and Hayato watch from safety as Takuma's sniper spot is hit by a cannon.
column12: The team explodes the main castle gate and the Shogunate army rushes inside. Mugen and Hayato watch from safety as Takuma's sniper spot is hit by a cannon.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: This is a glorious day! The Shogun will be victorious, and the war will finally end! We have accomplished much!
column12: 今日之战辉煌无比，将军必将取胜，战争终将结束。

column10: Agreed. Just don't expect me to split my pay with you.
column12: 同意，但我的佣金是不会分给你的。

column10: Hah, but I do expect you to pay for sake when this is over. Stay safe, Hayato-san! I must re-join the battle. For the Shogun!
column12: 哈哈，但是等战争结束后你能请我喝顿酒吧。保重，隼人兄！我必须回战场了。为了将军！

column10: Teh, samurai. Always eager to get killed.
column12: 果然，这帮武士总是这么拼命。

column9: camera shows Takuma shooting his rifle to support the Shogunate army
column10: Ah, history has been written today! The dawn of a new era. I didn't think I'd life to see it, hehe …
column12: 啊，今日必将载入史册！新时代即将到来。我本来以为这辈子看不到了，呵呵呵……

column9: camera moves to Shogunat troops preparing a row of siege cannons
column10: New orders from Lord Yabu. We are to attack the north towers. Aim the cannons.
column12: 薮大名下了新命令，要我们攻击北塔楼。火炮瞄准！

column10: W-wait … don't we have a man up there?
column12: 等一下……上面不是还有自己人吗？

column10: How dare you question an order? The cannons! Now!
column12: 你竟敢质疑命令？火炮立即准备！

column10: Y-yes, of course!
column12: 是-是，遵命！

column10: Fire!
column12: 开炮！

column10: Fools! What are they doing?!
column12: 蠢货！他们什么意思？！

column9: Takuma's tower is hit by a cannon, he falls off
column10: Aaah!
